    ‘PS Project’ for Photoshop CC / CS6 User Manual

    PS Project is a Photoshop CC / CS6 script that implements the idea of Project Files (a lightweight container of links to images on your disk, that you need to open frequently). This User Manual post will go into every detail of it.
